# Introduksjon

## Tre hovedtemaer: 
- Svingninger (del I)
- Økonomisk vekst (del II) 
- Økonomiske kriser (del III)

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)

usaunem <- get(load(paste0(devtools::as.package(".")$path,'/data/usaunem.rda')))
usagdp <- get(load(paste0(devtools::as.package(".")$path,'/data/usagdp.rda')))

# Data transformation
## unem
tusaunem <- usaunem %>% dplyr::select(date, value) %>% dplyr::mutate(date = as.Date(date), value = as.numeric(value)) %>% arrange(date)
## gdp
tusagdp <- usagdp %>% dplyr::select(date, value) %>% dplyr::mutate(date = as.Date(date), value = as.numeric(value)) %>% arrange(date) 
# ggplot
gobjusaunem <- ggplot(data = tusaunem, aes(date, value)) + geom_line()  + 
  geom_smooth(method = 'auto', color = 'red', size = 0.5, se = FALSE) + theme_classic() + 
  labs(x = "År", y = 'Arbeidsledighetsrate')

gobjusatusagdp <- ggplot(data = tusagdp, aes(date, value)) + geom_line() + 
  geom_smooth(method = 'loess', color = 'red',se = FALSE, size = 0.5) + theme_classic() + labs(x = "Dato") + labs(x = "År", y = 'BNP (realpriser)')

grid.arrange(gobjusatusagdp, gobjusaunem, ncol=2, top="USA")
```



```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)

usaunem <- get(load(paste0(devtools::as.package(".")$path,'/data/usaunem.rda')))
usagdp <- get(load(paste0(devtools::as.package(".")$path,'/data/usagdp.rda')))

# Data transformation
## unem
tusaunem <- usaunem %>% dplyr::select(date, value) %>% dplyr::mutate(date = as.Date(date), value = as.numeric(value)) %>% arrange(date) 

## gdp
tusagdp <- usagdp %>% dplyr::select(date, value) %>% dplyr::mutate(date = as.Date(date), value = as.numeric(value)) %>% arrange(date) 
# ggplot
gobjusaunem <- ggplot(data = tusaunem, aes(date, value)) + geom_line()  + 
  geom_smooth(method = 'loess', color = 'black' ) + theme_classic() + 
  labs(x = "År", y = 'Arbeidsledighetsrate') 
#+ scale_x_continuous()

gobjusatusagdp <- ggplot(data = tusagdp, aes(date, value)) + geom_line() + 
  geom_smooth(method = 'loess', color = 'black') + theme_classic() + labs(x = "Dato") + labs(x = "År", y = 'BNP (realpriser)')
#+ scale_y_continuous()

grid.arrange(gobjusatusagdp, gobjusaunem, ncol=2, top="Norge")
```
